pkgmetadata.longdescription: Haru PDF library is a ANSI/C library for generating PDF files. It supports the following features: 1. Generating PDF files with lines, text, images. 2. Outline, text annotation, link annotation. 3. Compressing document with deflate-decode. 4. Embedding PNG, Jpeg images. 5. Embedding Type1 font and TrueType font. 6. Creating encrypted PDF files. 7. Using various character sets (ISO8859-1~16, MSCP1250~8, KOI8-R). 8. Supporting CJK fonts and encodings.
